ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Regardless, we still love ya man, you lying sack of .... just kidding, Harm.
ygData.messageBody:
> I was surprised myself when it did so little damage. It is too bad the game
> does not tell you how much the AE breath does do, it would be easier to see
> how effective CR/FR is. All I know is that I will never do a dragon without
> my dragon kit :) At the Nag run I forgot my kit and had to get killed in a
> duel to grap it from the bank. One of the other bards at the Vox run was
> NOT in any visible resist gear (in nearly full plane armor, level 50) and
> she died, I finished with nearly full health.

Regardless, we still love ya man, you lying sack of ....

just kidding,
Harm.
